info.title: Frontend Driver Interface
info.description: These are the APIs exposed by our backend SDK. To be consumed by the frontend only.

post.description:
Start sign in/up process with passwordless.

Note: There is an invisible character at the end of the path, this was to avoid a conflict with the OpenAPI spec.

parameters.name: apiBasePath
parameters.description: Its value depends on the apiBasePath set by the user

200.description: Started the passwordless sign in/up process.

post.description:
Resend passwordless code

Note: There is an invisible character at the end of the path, this was to avoid a conflict with the OpenAPI spec.

parameters.name: apiBasePath
parameters.description: Its value depends on the apiBasePath set by the user

200.description: Started the passwordless sign in/up process.

post.description:
Finish sign in/up process with passwordless

Note: There is an invisible character at the end of the path, this was to avoid a conflict with the OpenAPI spec.

parameters.name: apiBasePath
parameters.description: Its value depends on the apiBasePath set by the user

schema.example: sAccessToken=eyJhb...%3D%3D; Path=/; Expires=Tue, 22 Jun 2021 07:43:07 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax; sRefreshToken=K91cQ7ezMbu...cb61c3.V2; Path=/auth/session/refresh; Expires=Thu, 30 Sep 2021 06:43:07 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax; sIdRefreshToken=6ed3...6c0d; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 30 Sep 2021 06:43:07 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax

anti-csrf.description: This will only be here if enabled by the user

get.description: Get all JSON web keys for JWT verification

parameters.name: apiBasePath
parameters.description: Its value depends on the apiBasePath set by the user

cookie.example: ed3164...06c0d; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 30 Sep 2021 06:43:07 GMT; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax

deviceId.description: This should be saved on the starting device to enable the manual code entry flow.

preAuthSessionId.description: An identifier that used to identify the login attempt/device.

authCodeResponse.description: Can contain random data other than the two listed below

code.description: The Authorization code which will be exchanged for an access token

state.description: A unique string used to mitigate CSRF attacks

code.description: The Authorization code which will be exchanged for an access token

state.description: A unique string used to mitigate CSRF attacks

code.description: The Authorization code which will be exchanged for an access token

state.description: A unique string used to mitigate CSRF attacks

issuer.description: URL using the https scheme with no query or fragment component that the OP asserts as its Issuer Identifier (https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-discovery-1_0.html section 3)

jwks_uri.description: URL for fetching a list JsonWebKey, used for JWT signature verification. Refer to /jwt/jwks.json API in the JWT recipe for JWK details

alg.description: The algorithm to use when creating the JWT.

inline_response_200_14_keys.description: A JWK that can be used to verify a JWT
